[bq="SquiggyBomb"]So I have a confession to make.
[spoiler]When I was a kid, I used to get freaked the fuck out by Elmo.[/spoiler][/bq]
My childhood "fear" (in quotes because it wasn't much of a fear) was the crescent moon: it reminded me too much of the Cheshire Cat. I wasn't scared of the Cheshire Cat, nor the moon itself. It just creeped me out that the crescent moon beared resemblance to his smile.
